CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 14, 1955, pg. 6 reads: "Constable Candidate And Wife - Mr. and Mrs. Silas Knox are shown as they await results of the primary elections May 17. Mr. Knox is candidate for constable on the Democratic ticket, the running mate of Lain L. Lee.  Mr. Knox is best known for breaking the taxi cab monopoly and founding the Owl Cab Company and other business interests."
TitMainTitle: Mrs. Knox and Silas Knox seated on sofa in domestic interior with large window with blinds and sculpture of two birds, another pose
